sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of Nike ( NKE ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.1%.
Year to date, Nike registers a 6.0% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 2.2%.
Home Depot is showing a gain of 0.7% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Goldman Sachs Group ( GS ), trading down 1.1%, and Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ), trading up 0.8% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
